profile.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.2.4 Colour Spaces - 6.2.4.3 Uncalibrated/Device colour spaces - DeviceRGB
profile.description: DeviceRGB shall only be used if a device independent DefaultRGB colour space has been set when the DeviceRGB colour space is used, or if the file has a PDF/A OutputIntent that contains an RGB destination profile.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium
